I used to have a pair of Thelees just like this that were amazing quality, but sadly, Uxcell is not the brand that cares about quality in the least, and these pants lack so much in what is expected from any pair of pants. The material is thin and crisp, like wearing a piece of paper almost. They fit ok at the waist, but the baggy crotch/butt area leaves you flapping in the wind. The material is uncomfortable and scratchy. Definitely don't sweat in these, or you'll be sore and raw. I absolutely CANNOT recommend these pants in any way! They fail in looks even for stage, they just don't fit well enough even to perform in, and as for comfort, they can't even pull that off.

评论概述: Be prepared to stun ... and run.
评论详情: Before these pants, I was just an average Joe. Once I slipped them on, I became something ... more.  I wouldn't claim that these pants will make you into an object of desire for anyone who sees you ... but that's what happened to me.  Fortunately, they are flexible enough that I can run like a young Paul McCartney being chased zombie-style by a horde of teens down Penny Lane.  It's not easy being a sex symbol. So, purchase these at the risk of your own peril.

评论概述: For the aspiring space pirate or rogue who just wants a casual day out on the town without standing out too much.
评论详情: Nice dressy pants and fabric.  A little more sci-fi and distinctive than your generic suit pants. Ideal for the buyer with fantasies of being Han Solo, or a space pirate without being too ostentatious about it.  Good neat casual "going out for a big night" pants or as a movie prop costume.  (those side buckles are just right for a blaster, pouch, flask or a light sabre with a little adjusting)Only downside is the fabric had an obvious "fresh out the factory" smell (one run through the wash for you then), and the zippers are only decorative. They open but theres nothing in there. A sewing kit and some scissors can probably fix that anyway. Would buy again.

First of all, the title is misleading.  As with most clothing in this style, most of the pockets are fake.  The two real pockets on either side of the front are barely large enough to fit a small phone, and the butt pockets are too slender to be of much use.  The zippers, although cool looking, do not lead anywhere.That aside, this is a very comfortable pair of pants.  The material is stretchy, but it will shrink in the first wash so order a size up.  It also collects lint like no one's business.  The zippers and the buckles are kind of cheap-feeling, but as they serve only as decoration, it doesn't detract from the value.  Overall it's about what you would expect for the price.

评论概述: if you want them to fit you just right do what I did take them to the tailor and lend them another pair of pants so they can see
评论详情: I received them a bit to baggy and long but after getting them sewed by a tailor and throwing them in the wash once they fit perfectly right, make sure to order your exact size or one size larger if you want them to fit as skinny jeans,  if you want them to fit you  just right do what I did take them to the tailor and lend them another pair of pants so they can see how skinny you want them if they're still too baggy put them in the washer and dryer and they will fit you just fine
The quality is ok, you definitely get what you pay for. For the price it's a good buy.

Pants arrived today, as described. Do note that these are almost entirely cotton. I normally wear a 31 waist U.S. but went with the 32. I tried them on pre-wash, and they were a bit bigger around the waist than anticipated. Post warm wash, they shrunk just a bit, but not detrimentally. I'll still need a belt, but that's not unusual for me. (31 is an uncommon size.) Even with the slight shrink, these are still a comfortable slim fit for my somewhat muscular legs. I didn't do it for the first wash, but do follow the instructions to "[m]achine wash inside out." It'll save some wear and tear on the clothes and on your washer/dryer from the buckles and zippers banging around. As for the seller, note they are in South Korea. I didn't catch that until checkout and saw the estimated ship time. I went with DHL Express because I needed them now, and the pants arrive super fast. But if you're in the U.S. and you want to save money on shipping, be sure to order these early and don't be in a hurry.
